column4: Tourism;Siem Reap:------ According to the National Police Commissioner
column5: one foreigner died at a Siem Reap hotel in Wat Damnak Village
column9: at 1:20 pm.------The police official said that the dead man was JOSEPH PATRICK BOLAND  43
column11: who was heavily tattooed.------After examining the corpse
column13: it is assumed that the victim died from liver failure/anemia cirrhosis caused by Hepatitis C.------ The body was then taken to Russian Hospital in Phnom Penh to wait for family to accept.------TVFB
